Posts.Content: my mother's medicine is xeloda (capecitabine), consequently, she suffers from palmar plantar syndrome her feet and hands are red, "burned" and scorched. therefore, she barely moves and when she does ,even 10 feet , she can't step on those feet for couple hours. she can't perform simple action with her hands. i want to ask you( if you are familiar with the syndrome ), how to ease her pain , or how to "eliminate" the syndrome thank you.
Posts.Title: palmar plantar syndrome treatment
